review: Stayed for 3 nights at this hotel. It was really wonderful experience. Mr.Sonam and his wife, who run this hotel are gem of  persons. They made every effort to make our stay most comfortable. Food was fantastic especially the Ladakhi delicacies. 5 stars for comfort, location, cleanliness,hospitality and food.
name: Rajbir Bawa

review: Very good clean room with clean washroom very good food homely feel with good hospitality by owner.regular customer in future homely stay property in center of city near to airport and Busstand excellent
name: neeraj s
